com.jackrl.bomberguygame.domain

Class Collisions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jackrl.bomberguygame.domain.Collisions

  • public class Collisions
extends Object
    Class that serves as a helper with the collisions between the player and the rest of the environment

      • checkCollisionsX

        public void checkCollisionsX(Player player,
                    int delta)
        Check the collisions of the player with the walls, blocks and bombs in the x-axis. the method prevents the player from going through these entities.
        Parameters:
        player -
        delta -

      • checkCollisionsY

        Parameters:

      • checkCollisionsWithEnemies

        public void checkCollisionsWithEnemies(Player player,
                              ArrayList<Enemy> enemies)
        Check if the player has collided with enemies. If it has collided with an enemy, the player will die.
        Parameters:
        player -
        enemies -

      • checkCollisionsWithExplosions

        public void checkCollisionsWithExplosions(Player player,
                                 ArrayList<Bomb> bombs)
        Check if the player has collided with the explosion of a bomb. If it has collided with an explosion, the player will die.
        Parameters:
        player -
        bombs -

      • checkCollisionsWithPowerUps

        public void checkCollisionsWithPowerUps(Player player,
                               ArrayList<PowerUp> powerUps)
                                 throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Check if the player has collided with any power-ups. If it has collided with one, the effect of the power-up will be applied to the player.
        Parameters:
        player -
        powerUps -
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
